::Ramulus::

Ramulus frowns as he hears Lunarpine. "That's insane. Those two will kill 
Ramhorn the moment we open fire."

He takes a few steps forward, looking at Shuko as he hears his demands.

"And during those five days, you will not attack us as well?" he asks 
carefully. If the answer was yes, then it would be a blessing for the 
Maximals as well...
